result.reason: The DesktopScaleFactor property in RdpProtocol.cs currently ignores the user-configured DesktopScaleFactor setting, forcing the remote session to use the local monitor's scaling (Auto) during session updates (like window resizing), which overrides any manual scaling preference (e.g., 125%).
result.approach: Modify the DesktopScaleFactor property in RdpProtocol.cs to respect the connectionInfo.DesktopScaleFactor setting. If set to a specific value (100, 125, 150, 200), return that value. Only fall back to the calculated local resolution scaling (ResolutionScalingFactor.Width * 100) when the setting is Auto.
